BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.route.context.RouteContext.getOriginalDataNodes() may expose internal representation by returning RouteContext.originalDataNodes
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.route.context.RouteContext.getRouteStageContexts() may expose internal representation by returning RouteContext.routeStageContexts
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.route.context.RouteContext.getRouteUnits() may expose internal representation by returning RouteContext.routeUnits
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.route.context.RouteUnit.getTableMappers() may expose internal representation by returning RouteUnit.tableMappers
new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.route.context.RouteUnit(RouteMapper, Collection) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into RouteUnit.tableMappers

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.route.engine.SQLRouteEngine(Collection, ConfigurationProperties) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into SQLRouteEngine.rules
